TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Texas Gazette, 03-20-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Editorial by Austin in Texas Gazette, March 20, 1830. Necessity for official translation of the State laws. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 347

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Editorial by Austin in Texas Gazette, March 20, 1830. Necessity for official translation of the State laws. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[Texas Gazette, March 20, 1830: Urging translation of the laws of Coahuila and Texas. The document is omitted.]*/p*
*/div1*
